content: I'm trying to improve my online engagement, especially on social media. I've been making an effort to comment more on other people's posts, especially in my niche. I recently attended a social media workshop and learned some new strategies, but I'm looking for more tips. By the way, I've had some not-so-great experiences online, like that one time on Reddit when I got into a long argument with several users on a sensitive topic, which turned ugly and made me want to avoid further drama.
